text: Anthony Bruce Brewer (born November 25, 1957) is a former Major League Baseball outfielder. He appeared in 24 games for the Los Angeles Dodgers during the baseball season. He went on to a productive career with the Nippon- Ham Fighters, where he batted .307 with 99 home runs in four seasons. He played college baseball at the University of Miami. He went to Palo Alto Senior High School and played, Football, Baseball and Wrestling.
